scripts.build:worker: opennextjs-cloudflare build && cp .open-next/worker.js .open-next/assets/_worker.js && cp -r .open-next/cloudflare .open-next/assets/ && cp -r .open-next/middleware .open-next/assets/ && cp -r .open-next/server-functions .open-next/assets/ && cp -r .open-next/.build .open-next/assets/
